---
title: "hdb car park data wrangling"
---

```{r}
pacman::p_load(maptools, sf, raster, spatstat, tmap, dplyr, tidyverse)
```

```{r}
carpark <- read_csv("hdb-carpark-information.csv")
```

```{r}
list(carpark)
```

```{r}
carpark_sf <- st_as_sf(carpark,
                       coords = c("x_coord", "y_coord"),
                       crs = 4326)
```

```{r}
carpark_sf <- st_set_crs(carpark_sf, 3414)
```

```{r}
st_crs(carpark_sf)
```
